name: Absolute Insanity
description:
** WOW! SUPER ADDICTIVE! **
** WE DARE YOU TO PLAY! **

Get ready for absolute insanity! In the latest frustration, yet simplistic game to hit the streets, you job is quite simple. Get the white bouncing ball to through a variety of obstacles. This might sound easy, but once you get your hands on this game, you will quickly find out just how hard it its. How far will you get?

Good luck!
